org.concordion.cubano.config

Class DefaultPropertyLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.concordion.cubano.config.DefaultPropertyLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertyLoader

    public class DefaultPropertyLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements PropertyLoader

    A PropertyLoader which loads a property, firstly checking the userProperties and then the properties. Within each set of properties, it firstly checks for a key matching environment.key and then for key where environment is set using setEnvironment and key is the key parameter.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultPropertyLoader(java.util.Properties properties)
      Configure the optional userProperties and mandatory properties to be loaded.
